amendment.description: To provide for a report to Congress on information systems interoperability, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1374 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1374 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9866; text: CR S9866) To provide for a report to Congress on information systems interoperability, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1374 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1374 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
